Properties.ProtectedString:
----------------------- --| Variables |-- ----------------------- local Tool = script.Parent local Handle = Tool:WaitForChild('Handle') local Players = Game:GetService('Players')
----------------------- --| GUI |-- ----------------------- local ScreenGui = Tool:WaitForChild('ScreenGui') local Frame = ScreenGui:WaitForChild('Frame') local Btn = Frame:WaitForChild('TextButton') local FillBar = Frame:WaitForChild('TextLabel') -- local ChargeStartTime = 0 -- local IsFired = false local CanFire = true local TheCharacter = nil math.randomseed(tick())
----------------------- --| Constants |-- ----------------------- local FIRE_DEBOUNCE_TIME = 0.25 local MAX_CHARGE_TIME = 1.5
----------------------- --| Animations |-- ----------------------- local CannonHold = Tool:WaitForChild('CannonHoldAnim') local CannonHoldTrack = nil local ChargeShotBegin = Tool:WaitForChild('ChargeShotBegin') local ChargeShotBeginTrack = nil local ChargeShotEnd = Tool:WaitForChild('ChargeShotEnd') local ChargeShotEndTrack = nil local ChargeLoop = Tool:WaitForChild('ChargeLoop') local ChargeLoopTrack = nil
----------------------- --| Sounds |-- ----------------------- local FireSoundId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=' .. tostring(146956281) local FireSound = Instance.new('Sound') FireSound.SoundId = FireSoundId FireSound.Parent = Handle -- local FuseSoundId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=' .. tostring(150908373) local FuseSound = Instance.new('Sound') FuseSound.SoundId = FuseSoundId FuseSound.Parent = Handle -- local KillSoundId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=' .. tostring(150929027) local KillSound = Instance.new('Sound') KillSound.SoundId = KillSoundId KillSound.Parent = Handle -- local DeathSoundId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=' .. tostring(150930819) local DeathSound = Instance.new('Sound') DeathSound.SoundId = DeathSoundId DeathSound.Volume = 0.5 DeathSound.Parent = Handle -- local ArrSounds = {} -- local ArrSound1Id = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=' .. tostring(150904011) local ArrSound1 = Instance.new('Sound') ArrSound1.SoundId = ArrSound1Id ArrSound1.Parent = Handle table.insert(ArrSounds, ArrSound1) -- local ArrSound2Id = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=' .. tostring(150904797) local ArrSound2 = Instance.new('Sound') ArrSound2.SoundId = ArrSound2Id ArrSound2.Parent = Handle table.insert(ArrSounds, ArrSound2) -- local ArrSound3Id = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=' .. tostring(150905232) local ArrSound3 = Instance.new('Sound') ArrSound3.SoundId = ArrSound3Id ArrSound3.Parent = Handle table.insert(ArrSounds, ArrSound3)
----------------------- --| Remote Events |-- ----------------------- local RemoteEvents = Tool:WaitForChild('RemoteEvents') local FireEvent = RemoteEvents:WaitForChild('OnFire') local ChargeEvent = RemoteEvents:WaitForChild('OnCharge') local PlayerKilledEvent = RemoteEvents:WaitForChild('OnKilledPlayer')
----------------------- --| Events |-- ----------------------- local function onPlayerKilled() KillSound:Play() end
local function StartFillBar() local xScale = 0 while not IsFired and xScale < 1 do xScale = math.min((tick() - ChargeStartTime) / MAX_CHARGE_TIME, 1) FillBar.Size = UDim2.new(xScale, 0, 1, 0) wait() end if not IsFired then FillBar.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.new(203 / 255, 0, 0) end end
local function EndFillBar() local t = 0 local deltaTime = tick() while t < 0.25 do local xScale = math.max(0, 1 - (t / 0.25)) FillBar.Size = UDim2.new(xScale, 0, 1, 0) t = t + (tick() - deltaTime) deltaTime = tick() wait() end FillBar.Size = UDim2.new(0, 0, 1, 0) FillBar.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.new(0, 85 / 255, 1) end
local function BeginChargeShot() if not TheCharacter then return end -- if not CanFire then return end -- local humanoid = TheCharacter:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 then if ChargeShotBeginTrack then FuseSound:Play() ChargeShotBeginTrack:Play() wait(0.25) -- animation delay if IsFired then IsFired = false return end ChargeStartTime = tick() Spawn(StartFillBar) ChargeEvent:FireServer() ChargeLoopTrack:Play() end end end
local function EndChargeShot() if not TheCharacter then return end -- if not CanFire then return end -- CanFire = false local humanoid = TheCharacter:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 then if ChargeShotBeginTrack then ChargeShotBeginTrack:Stop() end if ChargeLoopTrack then ChargeLoopTrack:Stop() end if FuseSound then FuseSound:Stop() end -- IsFired = true Spawn(EndFillBar) FireEvent:FireServer() FireSound:Play() ChargeShotEndTrack:Play() Delay(0, function() if ChargeLoopTrack then ChargeLoopTrack:Stop() end end) wait(FIRE_DEBOUNCE_TIME) IsFired = false end CanFire = true end
local function OnEquip(mouse) TheCharacter = Tool.Parent local humanoid = TheCharacter:FindFirstChild('Humanoid')
if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 then local player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(TheCharacter) if player then local gui = player:FindFirstChild('PlayerGui') if gui then ScreenGui.Parent = gui end end humanoid.Died:connect(function() DeathSound:Play() end) local r = math.random(1, #ArrSounds) ArrSounds[r]:Play() CannonHoldTrack = humanoid:LoadAnimation(CannonHold) CannonHoldTrack:Play() ChargeShotBeginTrack = humanoid:LoadAnimation(ChargeShotBegin) ChargeShotEndTrack = humanoid:LoadAnimation(ChargeShotEnd) ChargeLoopTrack = humanoid:LoadAnimation(ChargeLoop) end
if mouse then mouse.Button1Down:connect(BeginChargeShot) mouse.Button1Up:connect(EndChargeShot) Btn.MouseButton1Down:connect(BeginChargeShot) Btn.MouseButton1Up:connect(EndChargeShot) end end
local function OnUnequip() ScreenGui.Parent = Tool if CannonHoldTrack then CannonHoldTrack:Stop() end if ChargeShotBeginTrack then ChargeShotBeginTrack:Stop() end if ChargeShotEndTrack then ChargeShotEndTrack:Stop() end if ChargeLoopTrack then ChargeLoopTrack:Stop() end end
PlayerKilledEvent.OnClientEvent:connect(onPlayerKilled) Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquip) Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequip)

----------------------- --| Variables |-- ----------------------- local Tool = script.Parent local Handle = Tool:WaitForChild('Handle') local DebrisService = Game:GetService('Debris') local Players = Game:GetService('Players') local TheCharacter = nil -- local HitPlayers = {} local RemoteEvents = Tool:WaitForChild('RemoteEvents') local OnKilledPlayer = RemoteEvents:WaitForChild('OnKilledPlayer')
----------------------- --| Constants |-- ----------------------- local BASE_DMG = 25 local MAX_DMG = 100 local MAX_CHARGE_TIME = 1.5 local FIRE_OFFSET = Vector3.new(1.25, 1.5, -6.25) local SPEED = 50 -- local ChargeModifier = 0 local ChargeStartTime = 0
-- Returns a character ancestor and its Humanoid, or nil local function FindCharacterAncestor(subject) if subject and subject ~= Workspace then local humanoid = subject:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if humanoid then return subject, humanoid else return FindCharacterAncestor(subject.Parent) end end return nil end
local function FindCharacterFace() if TheCharacter then local head = TheCharacter:FindFirstChild('Head') if head then local face = head:FindFirstChild('face') return face end end end
local function FireCannonBall(position, velocity) local p = Instance.new('Part') p.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom p.Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) p.BrickColor = BrickColor.new('Black') p.CanCollide = false p.CFrame = CFrame.new(position) p.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth p.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth
local mesh = Instance.new('SpecialMesh') mesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.Sphere mesh.Parent = p
local bodyVelocity = Instance.new('BodyVelocity') bodyVelocity.velocity = velocity bodyVelocity.Parent = p
local smoke = Instance.new('Smoke') smoke.Color = Color3.new(141/255, 141/255, 141/255) smoke.Parent = p
p.Touched:connect(function(other) local hitCharacter, hitHumanoid = FindCharacterAncestor(other) local thisCharacter = nil if Tool.Parent then thisCharacter = Tool.Parent end if hitCharacter == thisCharacter then return end local dmg = (BASE_DMG * 2) * ChargeModifier + BASE_DMG if dmg >= 100 then local player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(thisCharacter) OnKilledPlayer:FireClient(player) local e = Instance.new('Explosion') e.Position = other.Position e.Parent = Workspace DebrisService:AddItem(e, 2) end if HitPlayers.hitCharacter then return end -- if hitCharacter and hitHumanoid and hitHumanoid.Health > 0 then HitPlayers.hitCharacter = true hitHumanoid:TakeDamage(dmg) p.Parent = nil Delay(1, function() if HitPlayers.hitCharacter then HitPlayers.hitCharacter = nil end end) end end)
DebrisService:AddItem(smoke, 2.5)
p.Parent = Workspace DebrisService:AddItem(p, 3) end
----------------------- --| Remote Events |-- ----------------------- local FireEvent = RemoteEvents:WaitForChild('OnFire') local ChargeEvent = RemoteEvents:WaitForChild('OnCharge')
local function OnFire() local character = Tool.Parent local torso = character:FindFirstChild('Torso') local pos = Vector3.new() if torso then pos = (torso.CFrame:inverse() * torso.Position) + FIRE_OFFSET pos = torso.CFrame * pos local direction = Vector3.new(Handle.CFrame.lookVector.x, 0, Handle.CFrame.lookVector.z).unit FireCannonBall(pos, direction * SPEED) ChargeModifier = ChargeStartTime > 0 and math.min(tick() - ChargeStartTime, MAX_CHARGE_TIME) or 0 ChargeStartTime = 0 end end
local function OnCharge() ChargeStartTime = tick() end
local CachedFace = nil local function OnEquip() TheCharacter = Tool.Parent local face = FindCharacterFace() if face then CachedFace = face.Texture face.Texture = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=19366214' end end
local function OnUnequip() local face = FindCharacterFace() if face and CachedFace then face.Texture = CachedFace end end
FireEvent.OnServerEvent:connect(OnFire) ChargeEvent.OnServerEvent:connect(OnCharge) Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquip) Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequip)
